issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113962 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.X unlocalized scaffold NT_113962 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC079036.44).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113966 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.X unlocalized scaffold NT_113966 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (BX323853.5).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113964 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.X unlocalized scaffold NT_113964 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC132010.21).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.summary: GeneID: 64109 (CRLF2), assembly gap
issue.status_text: ABC7-42506100J21 has been ordered to close the gap between BX901949.9 and AC188046.2 01-JUL-13: ABC7-42506100J21 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 25-JUL-12: ABC14-50117600I4 has been cancelled Accession for ABC14-50117600I4: FO082864 Accession for ABC7-42506100J21: FO538754
issue.description: pseudoautosomal region (BX908382.8; NT_033330.7(X); NT_113972.1 (Y)); no contig provides complete coverage for the gene
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC146820.1 appears redundant to AF207550.3
issue.description: AC146820.1 appears redundant to AF207550.3
issue.resolution_text: AC146820 removed from TPF. BX530088 and BX572102 now marked as contained within AF207550.

issue.summary: substitution error / very low freq snp in ATP7A in AL645821.1
issue.description: In the ATP7A gene in AL645821.1, an A>G substitution changes codon from K>E. The rs4826245 SNP is not validated.
issue.resolution_text: There was an incorrect edit in AL645821, which caused an A>G substitution resulting in a change in codon from K>E. This edit has now been corrected and the correct genome sequence has been resubmitted to Genbank.

issue.summary: GeneID: 90161 (HS6ST2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_147175.3 (HS6ST2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: This issue was caused by a region of poor quality within Z81365, this has now been rectified using data from overlapping clone AL022309.13 (RP3-475O24) over the region of low quality.

issue.summary: Deletion in genome affects coding exon of the DGKK gene
issue.description: cDNA AB183864.1 nucleotide 3121 is missing from the reference genome. It is a coding exon of the DGKK gene.
issue.resolution_text: The deletion in AL591367 was a a result of a sequencing error. This base has now been corrected in the accession and Genbank has been updated.

issue.summary: There is gap between AL591645 and the centromere
issue.status_text: There appears to be no further clones to select for this region at this time that would add any additional centromeric sequence.to the sequence that already exists.
issue.description: There is gap between AL591645 and the centromere
issue.resolution_text: AL591645 has ~17kb of centromeric repeat on its end. The type-3 gap between AL591645 and the centromere has now been removed.

issue.summary: There is a gap between BX537339 and the centromere
issue.description: There is a gap between BX537339 and the centromere
issue.resolution_text: BX537339 has ~43bb of centromeric repeat on its end. The type-3 gap between BX537339 and the centromere has now been removed

issue.summary: GeneID: 8225 (GTPBP6), missed join
issue.status_text: 13-JUN-13: ABC13-48610800L23 is on hold 17-JUN-13: ABC13-987222J4 is in active finishing Accession for ABC13-48610800L23: FO681514 Accession for ABC13-987222J4: FO681518
issue.description: Alignment of NM_012227 (GTBP6) suggests an unplaced clone can be used to either extend or fill this gap.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: WI2-1513D07 needs removing from the TPF
issue.description: WI2-1513D07 needs removing from the TPF
issue.resolution_text: WI2-1513D07 has been removed from the TPF as it consists entirely of repeat and does not align to BX640545 and AL954722 either side of the gap. This clone was added to the TPF post-GRCh37 and it's removal now does not change the assembly.

issue.summary: There is gap between BX537339.3 and the centromere
issue.status_text: Currently there are no suitable clones available for selection for tiling further toward the centromere.
issue.description: There is gap between BX537339.3 and the centromere
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: An RP11 clone pathway is being sequenced for an ampliconic region on Chromosome X between components AC233982.2 and AL138743.5 of GRCh37.
issue.description: An RP11 clone pathway is being sequenced for an ampliconic region on Chromosome X between components AC233982.2 and AL138743.5 of GRCh37.
issue.resolution_text: This TPF has been uploaded to the Chromosome X level TPF and Chromosome X patches TPF

issue.summary: GeneID: 2578 (GAGE6), missed join
issue.status_text: This ampliconic region is being retiled to produce a single haplotype , RP11 pathway The following clone has been selected to extend into the gap: 11-FEB-13: RP11-457I2 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: Some evidence suggests that this gap, which is in a region containing a duplicated gene family, may be caused by the reference assembly representing mixed haplotypes.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Unmarked contained relationship causing contig building error
issue.description: An unmarked contained relationship between AL356738.14 and updated component BX682237.7 is causing a contig building error.
issue.resolution_text: AL356738.14 is redundant under BX682237.6 and has been removed from the TPF. The contig building error should now be resolved.

issue.summary: Fix patch for ampliconic region from AL606467.5 to CR376831.3
issue.description: This issue duplicates a portion of of HG-525, and has been created solely for the release of a fix patch encompassing the GRCh37 ampliconic sub-region from AL606467.5 to CR376831.3.
issue.resolution_text: This patch provides a single haplotype representation for the ampliconic region between GRCh37 NC_000023.10 components AL606467.5 and CR376831.3, in contrast to the mixed haplotype that is present in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Fix patch for ampliconic region from CR376822.3 to AL607040.8
issue.description: This issue duplicates a portion of of HG-525, and has been created solely for the release of a fix patch encompassing the GRCh37 ampliconic sub-region from CR376822.3 to AL607040.8
issue.resolution_text: This patch provides a single haplotype representation for the ampliconic region between GRCh37 NC_000023.10 components CR376822.3 and AL607040.8, in contrast to the mixed haplotype that is present in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Fix Patch for ampliconic region of Chromosome X (GRCh37) consists of multiple haplotypes from AF196970.2 to BX546463.3
issue.description: Ampliconic region of Chromosome X (NC_000023.10:48,500,000-49,260,000) consists of multiple haplotypes.
issue.resolution_text: This new TPF has been uploaded to the patches TPF and chromosome TPF. As a result of the updated TPF, parts of the assembly within this region now appear as inverted when compared against previous assemblies.

issue.summary: Chr. X Gap Problem
issue.status_text: 24-JAN-14: ABC8-42664800J17 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for ABC8-42664800J17: FO681500 11-FEB-15: ABC14-8071949I16 has completed sequence production and a draft assembly has been submitted 17-DEC-14: ABC11-47249900N7 has entered the sequencing pipeline ABC14-8071949I16 contigs have been ordered and orientated ABC11-47249900N7 contigs have been ordered and orientated Accession for ABC11-47249900N7: LO016972 Accession for ABC14-8071949I16: LO016982
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of the gap problem outlined in HG-70
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. X Gap Problem
issue.status_text: The following clones have been selected to extend into the gap: 03-JUN-13: ABC27-80B18 has been cancelled 30-JAN-13: ABC8-5705749C6 has been cancelled
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of the gap problem outlined in HG-146. GeneID: 8823 (FGF16) now completely aligns to the region but a gap in the assembly still remains.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap between CR381640.8 and AC188622.2
issue.status_text: 17-JUN-13: ABC7-42471900A4 has been cancelled 20-MAY-14: ABC8-42545600H14 has been selected for sequencing Accession for ABC7-42471900A4: FO681498 11-FEB-15: ABC7-41821700A17 has completed sequence production and a draft assembly has been submitted ABC7-41821700A17 contigs have been ordered and orientated Accession for ABC7-41821700A17: LO016983
issue.description: There is a gap between CR381640.8 and AC188622.2 This is a continuation of work on the gap initially reported in HG-482
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap between AC188622.2 and CR856018.10
issue.description: There is a gap between AC188622.2 and CR856018.10
issue.resolution_text: The gap between components AC188622.2 and CR856018.10 has been resolved by the addition of CR856017.2 onto the TPF.

issue.summary: Switchpoint between BX510313.3 and BX119904.4 should be curated to include maximum RP11 sequence in ampliconic pathway.
issue.description: Switchpoint between BX510313.3 and BX119904.4 needs curated to include maximum RP11 sequence in ampliconic pathway.
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint here has been curated to include all of BX119904.4 and the patch TPF has been uploaded to the patches TPF.

issue.summary: Four separate new ampliconic pathways in the same region on Chrom. X
issue.description: Four separate ampliconic pathways on Chrom. X should be combined.
issue.resolution_text: This new TPF has been uploaded to the patches TPF and chromosome TPF. As a result of the updated TPF, parts of the assembly within this region now appear as inverted when compared against previous assemblies.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: This issue has now been declared stalled as it cannot be resolved using current technologies.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of the gap problem outlined in HG-73
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. X Gap Problem
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of the gap problem outlined in HG-713.
issue.resolution_text: GRCh37 component AC152010.1, previously removed for an ampliconic pathway, has been added to the Chromosome X TPF and Chromsome X patches TPF, closing the gap between components AC226403.3 and AC236972.3.

issue.summary: review possible incorrect bases in POU3F4
issue.description: The bases at chrX:82,764,040 and chrX:82,764,042 may be incorrect. cDNA evidence and high-coverage NA12878 data do not support the reference bases.
issue.resolution_text: There were sequencing errors at the following positions chrX:82,764,040 and chrX:82,764,042. These errors have now been corrected in accession Z82170.3.

issue.summary: Nucleotide errors have been identified in reference component Z93019.1
issue.description: Nucleotide errors have been identified in reference component Z93019.1
issue.resolution_text: Base pair errors at positions 57857347 and 57857369 of GRCh37 in component Z93019.1 have been corrected. The updated version of Z93019 containing the base corrections is Z93019.2, the corrected bases in Z93019.2 are now consistent with Huref and 1KG data.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC005000.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC005000.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The decoy sequence missing here was lost due to a historic switchpoint present on AC005000 when it was used as part of the patch NW_004070891.1. Due to retiling in this region the decoy sequence missing here is already being incorporated into the daily built contig and will be captured for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Indel rs11452643, affecting the GRIA3 gene, is reported by 1000genomes as never occurring, confirmed by additional analyses.
issue.description: Indel rs11452643 is reported by 1000genomes phase1 under strict accessibility criteria as never occurring and is also confirmed by Jared Simpson's 61mer analysis. It results in a frameshift in the GRIA3 gene.
issue.resolution_text: Indel rs11452643 was caused by a sequencing error in the reference genome component Z83848.1 , the deletion has now been corrected via PCR using the clone DNA for Z83848. This correction is reflected in the accession version Z83848.3

issue.summary: Indel rs77883713 affecting the LCA10 gene, is reported by 1000genomes as never occurring, confirmed by additional analyses.
issue.description: Indel rs77883713 is reported by 1000genomes phase1 under strict accessibility criteria as never occurring and is also confirmed by Jared Simpson's 61mer analysis. It results in a frameshift in the LCA10 gene.
issue.resolution_text: FO681481.1 has been used to correct Indel rs77883713 (causes a frameshift in the LCA10 gene) which resulted due to a sequencing error in the reference component U52112.2.

issue.summary: Indel rs58044961, affecting the Kozak signal of the GRIA3 gene is due to a sequencing error in the reference
issue.description: Indel rs58044961, affecting the Kozak signal of the GRIA3 gene is due to a sequencing error in the reference in Z83848.2
issue.resolution_text: Indel rs58044961 was caused by a sequencing error in the reference genome component Z83848.2 , the sequence has now been edited. This correction is reflected in the accession version Z83848.3

issue.summary: Component AL133271.22 contains misassemblies
issue.description: Component AL133271.22 contains misassemblies
issue.resolution_text: AL133271 now has a correct assembly, confirmed by restriction digest. The updated version is AL133271.23.

issue.summary: GeneID: 255313 (CT47.11), assembly gap
issue.description: CT47@ is a cluster of highly similar CT47 genes. Current 36.2 build contains only 12 copies of CT47 gene; according to PMID:16382448 the cluster has at least 13 highly similar copies of CT47 gene, and it appears that CT47.12 gene is missing from 36.2 build
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-439. Please see Jira issue HG-439 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: possible deletion in AL031000.1
issue.description: According to evidence from optical mapping data, reference clone AL031000.1 may have a deletion of ~11kb.
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC207450.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component CR381562.10 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Non-component CR381562.10 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: Non-component CR381562.10 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. Blast shows alignments to Chr Xp telomeric region. The exact placement of CR381562.10 is uncertain due to haplotypic variation and the nature of the repetitive sequence from which the component is composed. The best alignments are with existing tpf components BX640545 and AL954722 between which CR381562.10 has now been placed.

issue.summary: Non-component BX649323.12 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Non-component BX649323.12 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from BX649323.12 (30276-32044) present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly. Decoy BX649323.12 (36584-37892) has been captured in phase 2 component FO681518.1

issue.summary: Non-component BX511099.12 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Non-component BX511099.12 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. Blast shows alignment to Chr X.
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from BX511099.12 (15273-16889) present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: CR381562.10 was placed on the Chromosome X Unlocalized TPF but needs to be localized in the Reference.
issue.description: CR381562.10 is currently on the Chromosome X Unlocalized TPF
issue.resolution_text: CR381562.10 now has a placement on Chr X between components BX640545 and AL954722 close to the p arm telomere, see HG-1888 for further details regarding the placement of the clone.

issue.summary: The current placement of CR381562.10 on Chr Xp may not be reliable
issue.status_text: This issue is currently under review.
issue.description: The current placement of CR381562.10 on Chr Xp may not be reliable
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 729428 (GAGE12B), assembly gap
issue.status_text: This ampliconic region is being retiled to produce a single haplotype , RP11 pathway. The following clone has been selected to extend into the gap: 11-FEB-13: RP11-457I2 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline. CH17-293I18, CH17-22C18, CH17-424N11 and CH17-357J13 will get Miseq data at MGI as well.
issue.description: A portion of GeneID: 729428 (GAGE12B), is missing in an assembly gap.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 51616 (TAF9B), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113965 (component: BX276116.7) has an alignment to sequence on reference chr. X
issue.resolution_text: BX276116.7 has been verified redundant to sequence on chr. X and removed from the assembly.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC017047.4
issue.description: Analysis of GU267089.1, GU268042.1, GU267488.1, GU267581.1 and GU267340.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. X, suggest there may be ~9,565 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC017047.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible inversion in Reference component AC112654.2 (RP11-44F2)
issue.description: Possible inversion in Reference component AC112654.2 (RP11-44F2)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC bases in NC_000023.11: 222976 (R), 222980 (S), 222990 (W), 222582 (Y) and 222863 (Y) in component AEKP01217652.1.
issue.resolution_text: WGS component AEKP01217652.1, which contains IUPAC ambiguous bases was placed incorrectly in GRCh38. It's true alignment is to BX640545.2, which is a telomeric component. Since AEKP01217652.1 only adds a few extra copies of a telomeric repeat, it will be removed completely from the Chr. X TPF PAR region.

issue.summary: GeneID: 90060 (CCDC120), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: RP11-641J8 is currently being re-sequenced. It has been placed into the MGI miseq pipeline.
issue.description: GeneID: 90060 (CCDC120) is missing in the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 441531 (PGAM4), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113965 (component: BX276116.7) has an alignment to sequence on reference chr. X
issue.resolution_text: Draft component BX276116.7 has been removed from the assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100101629 (GAGE8), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: This ampliconic region is being retiled to produce a single haplotype , RP11 pathway The following clone has been selected to extend into the gap: 11-FEB-13: RP11-457I2 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: GAGE8 (Gene ID: 100101629) is reported as missing from the assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 729428 (GAGE12B), missing in assembly
issue.description: Some evidence suggests that this gap, which is in a region containing a duplicated gene family, may be caused by the reference assembly representing mixed haplotypes.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate issue of HG-197 (GeneID: 729428 (GAGE12B), assembly gap).

issue.summary: HsaX- PHF16 problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AL627143.13 and Z83822.1
issue.resolution_text: An inversion was found in the assemblies of overlapping clones AL627143.13 and Z83822.1. The inversion has now been corrected in AL627143 whose updated version is AL627143.15. The sequence of Z83822.1 has been clipped in order to represent the now correctly assembled AL627143 over this region.

issue.summary: Possible errors in repetitive region between AC115618.3 and AL589872.9
issue.description: The pathway between AC115618.3 and AL589872.9 may contain errors due to duplications and will be updated with a single haplotype pathway using all RP11 clones.
issue.resolution_text: This new TPF has been uploaded to the patches TPF and chromosome TPF. As a result of the updated TPF, parts of the assembly within this region now appear as inverted when compared against previous assemblies.

issue.summary: Possible errors in repetitive region between AL161777.4 and AF274854.4
issue.description: The pathway between AL161777.4 and AF274854.4 may contain errors due to duplications and will be updated with a single haplotype pathway using all RP11 clones.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket is a duplicate of issues HG-1453, HG-1458 and HG-1459. In the interest of specificity, TPF's have been added to each of these 3 tickets and this issue will be resolved.

issue.summary: GeneID: 56157 (TEX13A), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_031274.3 (TEX13A) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR confirmed the transcript sequence, and a review of traces showed that the alignment discrepancies were at positions of low quality. Z74477.1 has been updated to Z74477.2 to correct the bases and NM_031274.3 now has a perfect alignment.

issue.summary: GeneID: 203447 (NRK), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_198465.2 (NRK) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: This is a legitimate case of GT-AA splicing. NM_198465.2 aligns with GT-AA splice sites at 4362^4363, supported by two human transcripts (BX538345.1, DB328984.1) and baboon EY283075

issue.summary: GeneID: 283981 (CXYorf10), missed join
issue.status_text: 13-JUN-13: ABC13-48610800L23 is on hold 17-JUN-13: ABC13-987222J4 is in active finishing Accession for ABC13-48610800L23: FO681514 Accession for ABC13-987222J4: FO681518
issue.description: AK023454.1 aligns partially to AL954664.17 on chr X, and falls off the end into a gap. Its entire length aligns to AC126759.1; maybe AC126759.1 belongs in this position on X
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: BX293538.6 and AL353999.3 have 2 alignments in opposing orientation
issue.description: BX293538.6 and AL353999.3 have 2 alignments in opposing orientation, a situation that disrupts contig building
issue.resolution_text: Alignment selected for contig building.

issue.summary: Alignment between AC008162.3 and AL670379.17 is incompatible with contig building
issue.status_text: CH17-182I12 is in active finishing at TGI. RP11-1011F13 is as well. Accession for RP11-1011F13: FQ865453
issue.description: The alignment between AC008162.3 and AL670379.17 is incompatible with contig building
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Contig buildind blocked b/c no alignment /certificate found for AJ271735.1 and AJ271736.1
issue.description: No alignment /certificate is found for AJ271735.1 and AJ271736.1, which is blocking contig building
issue.resolution_text: Certificate submitted for blunt join.

issue.summary: Chr.X Component Gap Problem
issue.description: This ticket was created in error; no problem exists.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket was created in error; no problem exists. .

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.status_text: 29-NOV-12: ABC9-45919000E9 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for ABC9-45919000E9: FO704801
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX640545.2 and AL954722.18.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL672277.20 and BX908402.3.
issue.resolution_text: An overlap between AL672277.20 and BX649635.3 closes two gaps and renders BX908402.3 redundant in GRCh37 NC_000023.10

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between BX908402.3 and BX649635.3.
issue.resolution_text: An overlap between AL672277.20 and BX649635.3 closes two gaps and renders BX908402.3 redundant in GRCh37 NC_000023.10

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between CR381640.8 and CR856018.10.
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been updated here with AC188622.2 being inserted into the gap between CR381640.8 and CR856018.10 based on alignment to HuRef. Therefore the gap between CR381640.8 and CR856018.10 no longer exists. Work on the updated gaps will continue in HG-1475 and HG-1476

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX293536.4 and BX510359.3.
issue.resolution_text: With the submission of Build37-patch10, HG1433_patch closes the gap between BX293536 and BX510359 in GRCh37 (NC_000023.10).

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX530099.1 and BX530410.3.
issue.resolution_text: A single-haplotype RP11 tilepath has been selected by the Page Lab added to this region on the left side of this gap (HG-1463). Further progress of this gap can be followed in HG-1506.

issue.summary: Possible errors in repetitive region between AL606516 and AL607040.
issue.description: The pathway between AL606516 and AL607040 may contain errors due to duplications and will be updated using a single haplotype pathway using all RP11 clones.
issue.resolution_text: This TPF has been uploaded to the Chromosome X level TPF and Chromosome X patches TPF

issue.summary: Possible errors in repetitive region between AL137013 and AL138743.
issue.description: The pathway between AL137013 and AL138743 may contain errors due to duplications and will be updated using a single haplotype pathway using all RP11 clones.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of HG-1381. For further progress on this problem, please refer to HG-1381.

issue.summary: Possible errors in repetitive region between AL772262 and AL445246.
issue.description: The pathway between AL772262 and AL445246 may contain errors due to duplications and will be updated using a single haplotype pathway using all RP11 clones.
issue.resolution_text: This new TPF has been uploaded to the patches TPF and chromosome TPF.

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: TPF modification: Gap inserted between accession AC108685.4 (RP11-323F16) and AC074034.19 (RP11-143E20).
issue.resolution_text: There is a blunt join between components AC108685.4 and AC074034.19. WGS data from ABBA01029268.1 spans the join boundary between the two components and confirms the join.

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: TPF modification: Gap inserted between accession AC002349.1 (RP11-323F16) and U96409.1 (RP1-39D12).
issue.resolution_text: There is an 80bp overlap between AC002349.1 and U96409.1, the overlap is confirmed by sequence data from RP11- 89B5. RP11- 89B5 has been removed from the TPF as it is not required.

issue.summary: Unplaced component assigned to wrong chromosome and appears redundant
issue.description: Unplaced component Z71187.1may be redundant to reference component AL591804.5.
issue.resolution_text: Z71187 (LL0XNC01-115G11) has been removed from the unlocalized chr. 1 TPF, and the TPF re-submitted

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between the telomere and component BX640545.2
issue.resolution_text: BX640545.2 contains approximately 33bp of telomeric repeat on its end, this is confirmed by Harold Riethman's human telomere analysis (GSOFT-22).

issue.summary: GeneID: 92002 (FAM58A), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Possible functional difference between the protein encoded by the Refseq for FAM58A (NM_152274.3, Gene ID:92002) and the genomic reference component to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product PCR_RP11_AF274858_1 (FQ908264.1) confirms sequence of NM_152274.3 at positions120 and 157.

issue.description: Blunt join between CR753863.9 and BX546444.14
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX842568.3 and BX469937.2
issue.resolution_text: A single-haplotype RP11 tilepath has been selected by the Page Lab added to this region on either side of this gap (HG-525, HG-1423 and HG-1424). Further progress of this gap can be followed in HG-1466.

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX546463.3 and BX323840.3
issue.resolution_text: A single-haplotype RP11 tilepath has been selected by the Page Lab added to this region on either side of this gap (HG-1436/HG-1432 and HG-1433). Further progress of this gap can be followed in HG-1506.

issue.summary: Join between AC152006.1 and AC151958.2 requires assessment
issue.description: Join between AC152006.1 and AC151958.2 requires assessment
issue.resolution_text: This region has been replaced in GRCh37-patch10 with a single-haplotype ampliconic pathway through the region (HG-1497). Since components AC152006.1 and AC151958.2 have been replaced in the TPF, this issue is now resolved (GRC-Gap Update). Further progress on this gap problem can be followed in HG-1510.

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX936379.3 and AL953862.4
issue.resolution_text: A single-haplotype RP11 tilepath has been selected by the Page Lab added to this region on either side of this gap (HG-1434 and HG-1462). Further progress of this gap can be followed in HG-1507.

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX322645.4 and BX323827.5
issue.resolution_text: A single-haplotype RP11 tilepath has been selected by the Page Lab added to this region on either side of this gap (HG-1458 and HG-1459). Further progress of this gap can be followed in HG-1509/

issue.summary: Chr.X Gap Problem
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC016941.9 and BX927209.6
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of a Page Lab ampliconic TPF, this gap is now closed (HG1459_patch).

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP5-1111N9 to be removed from the TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP5-1111N9 to be removed from the TPF
issue.resolution_text: In order to remove the split finish of RP5-1111N9, WI2-8737H7 (BX546451),the clone that created the split, and covers a deletion in RP5-1111N9 has been entered into the TPF as CONTAINED. RP5-1111N9 has been resubmitted to its full length, the updated accession is AL022574.

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP11-460G6 to be removed from the TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP11-460G6 to be removed from the TPF
issue.resolution_text: Split finish clone RP11-460G6_A and RP11-460G6_B has now been removed from the TPF. It has been replaced by a single accession for RP11-460G6 (AL442648.6). A new clone WI2-2021I7 (FP928998.2) has been entered into the TPF to close the gap between RP5-961K14 (AL137845.9) and RP1-199L16 (AL022151.2).
